mapper.insert: insert into zc_vehicle_model( agent_id, agent_name, agent_code, model_name, is_active, model_image_path, view_image_path1, view_image_path2, view_image_path3, view_image_path4, product_image_path1, product_image_path2, product_image_path3, product_image_path4, product_image_path5, product_image_path6, after_sale_image_path1, after_sale_image_path2, after_sale_image_path3, after_sale_image_path4, after_sale_image_path5, after_sale_image_path6, faq_image_path1, faq_image_path2, faq_image_path3, faq_image_path4, faq_image_path5, faq_image_path6, memo, create_time ) values ( #{agentId}, #{agentName}, #{agentCode}, #{modelName}, #{isActive}, #{modelImagePath}, #{viewImagePath1}, #{viewImagePath2}, #{viewImagePath3}, #{viewImagePath4}, #{productImagePath1}, #{productImagePath2}, #{productImagePath3}, #{productImagePath4}, #{productImagePath5}, #{productImagePath6}, #{afterSaleImagePath1}, #{afterSaleImagePath2}, #{afterSaleImagePath3}, #{afterSaleImagePath4}, #{afterSaleImagePath5}, #{afterSaleImagePath6}, #{faqImagePath1}, #{faqImagePath2}, #{faqImagePath3}, #{faqImagePath4}, #{faqImagePath5}, #{faqImagePath6}, #{memo}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE zc_vehicle_model SET agent_id = #{agentId}, agent_name = #{agentName}, agent_code = #{agentCode}, model_name = #{modelName}, is_active = #{isActive}, model_image_path = #{modelImagePath}, view_image_path1 = #{viewImagePath1}, view_image_path2 = #{viewImagePath2}, view_image_path3 = #{viewImagePath3}, view_image_path4 = #{viewImagePath4}, product_image_path1 = #{productImagePath1}, product_image_path2 = #{productImagePath2}, product_image_path3 = #{productImagePath3}, product_image_path4 = #{productImagePath4}, product_image_path5 = #{productImagePath5}, product_image_path6 = #{productImagePath6}, after_sale_image_path1 = #{afterSaleImagePath1}, after_sale_image_path2 = #{afterSaleImagePath2}, after_sale_image_path3 = #{afterSaleImagePath3}, after_sale_image_path4 = #{afterSaleImagePath4}, after_sale_image_path5 = #{afterSaleImagePath5}, after_sale_image_path6 = #{afterSaleImagePath6}, faq_image_path1 = #{faqImagePath1}, faq_image_path2 = #{faqImagePath2}, faq_image_path3 = #{faqImagePath3}, faq_image_path4 = #{faqImagePath4}, faq_image_path5 = #{faqImagePath5}, faq_image_path6 = #{faqImagePath6}, memo = #{memo} WHERE id = #{id}
